alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 30 at 8:21PM MST until January 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 050, 063, 064, 065, 068, AND 069... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 050, 063, 064, 065, 068, and 069. * WIND...southwest winds will increase by mid-day Monday and become strong in the afternoon. Sustained winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph will be possible. * HUMIDITY...Lowest relative humidity values may fall between 15 and 25 percent by the middle of the afternoon. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton
